DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study obtain outcome data Anatomical Shoulder Fracture System analysis standard score system radiograph . Outcome data collect use follow standard score system : - Constant Murley Score - Oxford Shoulder Score - EQ-5D ( EuroQol )
DOC.detailed_description: This multi-centre , non-comparative , prospective post-market surveillance study involve surgeon skilled shoulder replacement surgery . Each case enrol receive Anatomical Shoulder Fracture implant . All system component CE ( Conformité Européenne ) -marked commercially available . Patients select accord subject selection criterion . All patient undergo pe-operative , intra-operative post-operative physical examination , radiographic evaluation accord hospital 's routine procedure collection quality life metric . Follow-up evaluation conduct 6-12 week ( x-ray ) , 6 month annually thereafter minimum period 5 year post hospital discharge . Follow-up evaluation 10 year post hospital discharge optional .
DOC.criteria: Age 18 year minimum . Sex male female . General Health patient able undergo surgery participate followup program base upon physical examination medical history . Informed Consent patient patient 's legal representative sign 'Patient Informed Consent form ' . Indications Diagnosis trauma affect joint indication shoulder hemiarthroplasty . Patient skeletally immature . Patient pregnant . Patient unwilling unable cooperate followup program . Patient plan bilateral shoulder replacement . Patient show one follow medical condition : Pathological Fracture Active Infection Patient require one follow medical intervention : Revision surgery ( nonunion ) Inverse fracture prosthesis
